coreAtributes.name: Mjolnir Armor
coreAtributes.description: The Mjolnir Powered Assault Armor is a technologically-advanced combat exoskeleton system designed to vastly improve the strength, speed and agility of the wearer. This is not one of them.

displacementText.playerSelf: You take off the Mjolnir Armor, it takes quite a while.
displacementText.playerNPC: You remove [npc.name]'s Mjolnir Armor, it takes quite a while.
displacementText.playerNPCRough: You grab hold of [npc.name]'s Mjolnir Armor and start to tear it apart piece by piece.
displacementText.NPCSelf: [npc.Name] takes off [npc.her] Mjolnir Armor, it takes quite a while.
displacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.Name] takes off your Mjolnir Armor, it takes quite a while.
displacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] grabs hold of your Mjolnir Armor and starts to tear it apart piece by piece.
displacementText.NPCOtherNPC: [npc1.Name] takes off [npc2.name]'s Mjolnir Armor, it takes quite a while.
displacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc.Name] grabs hold of [npc2.name]'s Mjolnir Armor starts to tear it apart piece by piece.

replacementText.playerSelf: You put on the Mjolnir Armor, it takes quite a while.
replacementText.playerNPC: You put the Mjolnir Armor on [npc.name]'s body, it takes quite a while.
replacementText.playerNPCRough: You hold [npc.name] still as you roughly force the Mjolnir Armor onto [npc.her] body, it takes quite a while.
replacementText.NPCSelf: [npc.Name] puts on the Mjolnir Armor, it takes quite a while.
replacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.Name] equips you with the Mjolnir Armor, it takes quite a while.
replacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] holds you still as [npc.she] roughly forces the Mjolnir Armor onto your body, it takes quite a while.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPC: [npc1.Name] equips the Mjolnir Armor on [npc2.name], it takes quite a while.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc1.Name] holds [npc2.name] still as [npc1.she] roughly forces the Mjolnir Armor onto [npc2.name]'s body, it takes quite a while.

displacementText.playerSelf: You spend some time removing parts of your Mjolnir Armor, careful not to kill yourself in the process.
displacementText.playerNPC: You spend some time removing parts of [npc.name]'s Mjolnir Armor, careful not to kill both of you in the process.
displacementText.playerNPCRough: You grab hold of [npc.name] and start to tear off the pieces of [npc.her] Mjolnir Armor.
displacementText.NPCSelf: [npc.Name] spends some time removing parts of [npc.her] Mjolnir Armor, careful not to kill [npc.her]self in the process.
displacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.Name] spends some time removing parts of your Mjolnir Armor, careful not to kill both of you in the process.
displacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] grabs hold of you and starts to tear off the pieces of your Mjolnir Armor.
displacementText.NPCOtherNPC: [npc1.Name] spends some time removing parts of [npc2.name]'s Mjolnir Armor, careful not to kill both of you in the process.
displacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc1.Name] grabs hold of [npc2.name] and starts to tear off the pieces of [npc2.her]'s Mjolnir Armor.

replacementText.playerSelf: You put back the missing pieces on your Mjolnir Armor.
replacementText.playerNPC: You put back the missing pieces on [npc.name]'s Mjolnir Armor.
replacementText.playerNPCRough: You hold [npc.name] still as you haphazardly piece together [npc.her] Mjolnir Armor.
replacementText.NPCSelf: [npc.Name] puts back the missing pieces on her Mjolnir Armor.
replacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.Name] puts back the missing pieces of your Mjolnir Armor.
replacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] holds you still as [npc.she] haphazardly piece together your Mjolnir Armor.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPC: [npc1.Name] puts back the missing pieces together [npc2.name]'s Mjolnir Armor.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc1.Name] grabs hold [npc2.name] and starts to haphazardly piece together [npc2.her] Mjolnir Armor.
